response.overview: Music and video production by Epoch Collapse.  Music is from Mediaeval Experiments (Aevum I, Aevum II - First and Second Movements) - the 5th album of 'Unprepared Piano'.  Artwork - Early Renaissance artists:  Pieter Brueghel the Elder, Jan Brueghel.  Medieval artist:  Hieronymus Bosch.  This video can be found on YouTube - on the Epoch Collapse channel. response.title: Mediaeval Experiments (Aevum I, Aevum II)
